text: Stephen Jolin, better known as Anodajay, is a rapper from Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec in Canada."Anodajay: "Jamais Su" retour dans les 80's avec Diane Tell", musiqueradio.com, 19 April 2011, retrieved 2011-06-04Matte, Christian (2010) "Anodajay s'offre la 7e rue pour son 3e album", Canoe.ca, 04-09-2010, retrieved 2011-06-04 == Biography == Anodajay first encountered hip hop at the age of twelve, and from the age of sixteen became more involved in it, along with his other main interest basketball.Boudreault, Pierre-Wilfrid et al (2004) L'imaginaire Urbain et les Jeunes : La ville comme espace d'expériences identitaires et créatrices, Presses de l'Université du Québec, , p. 329 et seq He worked as a physical education teacher at D'Iberville school for several years before pursuing music as a full-time career.Rodrigue, Patrick (2011) "Anodajay allume les jeunes pour les convaincre d’éteindre", Abitibi Express, February 4, 2011, retrieved 2011-06-04 He released his first album in 2003, and his latest, ET7ERA, was released in 2010. == Discography == ===Albums=== *2003: Premier VII *2006: Septentrion *2010: ET7ERA ===EPs=== *2005: Le 7 secondes… (EP) ===Singles=== *2011: "Jamais su" *2011: "Mon neighborwood" ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rouyn-Noranda Category:Canadian male rappers Category:21st-century Canadian rappers Category:Musicians from Quebec Category:French Quebecers
title: Anodajay
